meanings.definition: Relating to or located at the front of a structure, especially a building.
meanings.sent1: The antefixal design on the building's facade added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The antefixal decorations on the front of the house were beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent3: The antefixal ornament on the entrance made the building look welcoming.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an antefixal feature, brightening up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The antefixal details of the architecture stood out against the clear sky.

meanings.definition: Serving as a decorative element at the top of a roof or wall.
meanings.sent1: The antefixal sculptures on the roof were intricately carved.
meanings.sent2: The antefixal patterns on the wall added charm to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The antefixal figures seemed to dance in the moonlight, casting playful shadows.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like an antefixal melody.
meanings.sent5: The antefixal motifs on the roof caught the sunlight, creating a dazzling display.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to an antefix.
meanings.sent1: The antefixal artifact was carefully preserved in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The antefixal symbol held great significance in ancient rituals.
meanings.sent3: The antefixal relic was said to bring good luck to those who possessed it.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace gleamed like an antefixal treasure, drawing admiration from all.
meanings.sent5: The antefixal engraving on the stone tablet told a story of forgotten times.
